item.title: What Makes 10 Mbps Ethernet So Popular?
item.description: A popular bandwidth solution for businesses today is 10 Mbps Ethernet. This article will explain what it is and its benefits. We’re referring to Metro Ethernet or Carrier Ethernet connections operating at 10 Mbps. These connections can link two business locations, provide dedicated internet access, or connect to a larger cloud network for broader reach. Why is 10 Mbps a popular choice? It sits in a “sweet spot” for bandwidth. While T1 lines at 1.
